entries.meaning: (statistics) Any of the values in a series that divides the distribution of individuals in that series into ten groups of equal frequency.
examples: Although few people scored high marks, everyone did quite wellâ€”the lowest decile was over 50%.

entries.meaning: Any one of the ten subsets or groups so divided.
examples: Our school is in the top decile for exam results.

entries.meaning: (astrology) An aspect or position of two planets when they are distant from each other a tenth part of the zodiac.
